title: Lima Airport Transfers by SUV/Van
description: Family company, Quality with experience for 20 years, new, clean and punctual units, tour guides in English and Italian, bilingual drivers in English, Italian and Portuguese.
all_descriptions: Family company, Quality with experience for 20 years, new, clean and punctual units, tour guides in English and Italian, bilingual drivers in English, Italian and Portuguese.
We pick up from anywhere in Peru to Lima or vice versa, with our own units and with a lot of security, bilingual drivers, professionals and with a lot of good vibes.
provider:
Google. Google disclaims all warranties, express or implied, with respect to translations, including any warranties of accuracy, reliability, and any implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and freedom from forgery.
Amgermai
Tampa, FL11 contributions

Excellent Transport Service

Jun 2025 • Family
We used ‘Crown Taxi and Remisse’ for three transports during our family vacation in Peru. Communication with the manager was excellent (via WhatsApp). The transport service was punctual and efficient. Vans were clean and comfortable. Drivers were polite, friendly, and safe. The experience was excellent. I fully recommend and would use again.
Written June 12, 2025
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Will use again

Hired from airport to hotel, downtown trip and go back to airport.
It was smooth ride. Driver dropped us at downtown and pick up the meeting point.
Written July 22, 2024

Hook, UK62 contributions

Taxi from Airport to Hotel

Great service - driver was waiting for us at the airport when we arrived in Lima after a very long journey from London. Driver was very helpful and spoke perfectly good English
Written February 11, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Reme C
Paris, France1 contribution

Excellent!

Oct 2023 • Family
From our arrival in Lima until our departure from Cusco everything went as planned. We had done the classics of southern Peru: Lima, Nasca, Arequipa, Puno, Cusco and of course the fabulous Machu Pichu, and also some sites off the beaten track.

Excellent driver (we always felt safe by his driving) but also excellent qualified guide.

The big plus is that we had the same guide throughout the trip. This created a very friendly atmosphere.
Written November 2, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Laura N
Arlington, VA20 contributions

A Stellar Experience with Crown Transportation: A Lifesaver for Our Trip

Jun 2023
Excellent Experience with Crown Transportation!

I cannot praise Crown Transportation enough for the outstanding service they provided during our trip. From the very beginning, they showed exceptional flexibility and accommodation when our schedules and flights faced cancellations and delays. Thanks to their prompt and efficient communication, particularly Martin's rapid responses, our entire journey was saved.

The drivers, Miguel, Oscar, and David, deserve special recognition for their remarkable skills behind the wheel. Navigating the chaotic traffic of Lima with such smoothness and composure was truly impressive. They made our daily commutes comfortable and stress-free, allowing us to relax and enjoy the sights without worrying about the road ahead.

Crown Transportation's commitment to customer satisfaction was evident in every aspect of our experience. Their ability to provide us with alternative options whenever needed demonstrated their dedication to ensuring our journey went smoothly.

I highly recommend Crown Transportation to anyone visiting Lima or in need of reliable transportation services. Their team's professionalism, punctuality, and willingness to go the extra mile made our trip truly memorable. Five stars without a doubt!
Written July 28, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Jaden Z
Fargo, ND3 contributions

Amazing guide and even better memories!

Martin was an amazing Driver! He was punctual, funny, kind and overall a fun guy to be around. He was very knowledgeable on so much about Perus history. Highlight of the trip was definitely the karaoke jams session we had on our long drives!
Written March 17, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Great experience

Crown are very nice! hey response very timely and very helpful. Highly recommended! The driver is also very nice and arrived on time

Hannah S
Lugano, Switzerland3 contributions

Best driver/ translator/ guide

Oct 2022 • Friends
We had a wonderful time in Lima/ Paracas/ Nasca with Martin as our driver/ translator/ guide. Martin was EXCELLENT - he was on time, the car was clean, he had great suggestions for meals and snacks, he was patient and thoughtful, we felt very safe, he was very knowledgeable about everything we asked about. I will highly recommend Crown Taxi & Remisse to any of my friends and family who are thinking of visiting Peru!
Written October 4, 2022
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Élodie
11 contributions

5 stars for Crown Taxi and 5 more for Martin

Aug 2022 • Family
A massive thank you to Crown Taxi and Martin for making us discovering the wonder of Peru, it's culture and history.

Without Martin it'd have benn totaly different, he is always sharing his good network, available, listening and in a good mood.

The program was totaly respected and the car always clean during the two weeks of adventure we had form Lima to Cuzco.

We totaly recommanded Crown taxi.
Written August 28, 2022
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Eric F
1 contribution

double charge / doble cargo

May 2022
I paid by bank deposit to pick up my friends, but forgot to tell them, and then the driver went ahead and accepted a cash payment. When I learned of the double charge, he argued it was a "tip," but ultimately after some arguing, agreed to pay it back, after deducting a fee for delivering the refund. // Pagué por depósito bancario para recoger a mis amigos, pero olvidé decírselo, y luego el conductor siguió adelante y aceptó un pago en efectivo de mis amigos. Cuando me enteré del cargo doble, argumentó que era una "propina", pero finalmente, después de algunas discusiones, accedió a devolverlo, después de deducir una tarifa por entregar el reembolso.
Written May 31, 2022
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Crown Enterprises Peru
afortunadamente, podemos ser muy organizados en nuestro trabajo, podemos ofrecer un muy buen servicio (Porfavor mira las diferentes reviews de otros viajeros), pero desafortunadamente no podemos controlar y organizar su vida, sus acciones, sus amistades o amenazas.
